trans-unit.source: The type of the expression to evaluate against cases.
trans-unit.target: O tipo da expressão a ser avaliado nas ocorrências.

trans-unit.source: A specialized <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode" /> that allows modeling a switch construct, with one expression and one outcome for each match.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode" /> especializado que permite a modelagem de um constructo de opção, com uma expressão e um resultado para cada correspondência.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowSwitch%601> node.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowSwitch%601> nó.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é proveniente do [tratamento de falhas em um fluxograma atividade usando TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowSwitch`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowSwitch`1" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowSwitch%601> node.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowSwitch%601> nó.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é proveniente do [tratamento de falhas em um fluxograma atividade usando TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary of cases to be processed by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowSwitch`1" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um dicionário de casos a serem processadas pelo elemento <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowSwitch`1" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of cases.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de casos.

trans-unit.source: Each element in the dictionary consists of an object of the generic type specified in <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowSwitch%601.%23ctor%2A> and a corresponding <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode> to execute.
trans-unit.target: Cada elemento no dicionário consiste em um objeto do tipo genérico especificado em <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowSwitch%601.%23ctor%2A> e correspondente <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode> para executar.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates setting the Cases property of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowSwitch%601> node.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra a definição da propriedade de casos de um <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowSwitch%601> nó.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é proveniente do [tratamento de falhas em um fluxograma atividade usando TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode" /> to be executed if no elements in the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.FlowSwitch`1.Cases" /> collection match the result of the evaluation of the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.FlowSwitch`1.Expression" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode" /> a ser executado se nenhum elemento na coleção <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.FlowSwitch`1.Cases" /> corresponder ao resultado da avaliação do <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.FlowSwitch`1.Expression" />.

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode" /> to execute.
trans-unit.target: O padrão <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode" /> para executar.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates setting the Default property of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowSwitch%601> node.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra definindo a propriedade padrão de um <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowSwitch%601> nó.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é proveniente do [tratamento de falhas em um fluxograma atividade usando TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of this flow switch to be displayed in the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome desta opção de fluxo a ser exibida no designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The name of the flow switch.
trans-unit.target: O nome do comutador de fluxo.

trans-unit.source: The expression to evaluate against the collection of <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.FlowSwitch`1.Cases" />.
trans-unit.target: A expressão a ser avaliada na coleção de <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.FlowSwitch`1.Cases" />.

trans-unit.source: The expression to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: A expressão a ser avaliada.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates setting the Expression property of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowSwitch%601> node.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra a definição da propriedade de expressão de uma <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowSwitch%601> nó.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample.
